name: Captain MaCaw
description: A retro platform adventure in the style of the ZX Spectrum.........starring a pirate! ARRRR!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: On Board
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: On Board
